publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2463.2 Carolyn Leckie: Identity Cardsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-2463) in the name of Patrick Harvie, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "believes that the Parliament should take a clear stand against the principle and implementation of a national identity card and the identity database; congratulates campaigners for their efforts so far, and hopes for their success in halting implementation of the Identity Cards Bill."
